com.jawidmohammadi.applocker.model.repository

Class AppRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jawidmohammadi.applocker.model.repository.AppRepository

  • public class AppRepository
extends Object
    this class retrieve data from DAO database or any Web Services, for ViewModel to avoid directly have ViewModel connect to DAO and Entity classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppRepository(Context context)
      this method uses when context is null it is going to throw a new illegalStateException.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Single<Set<App>> getAll()
      This method retrieve set of the all apps from the device and from package manager.
      Completable lock(String pkg, String password)
      This method Store the password for each app in the database but before storing just the password it self, the password get hashed and added some random generated latters and numbers to it (salt) that when it stored in the database it can be different from the other apps that have tha same password.
      void logAttempt(App app, Timestamp timestamp, String password) 
      Completable remove(App app)
      this method see if there is any app restricted if so it will delete it other wise does nothing.
      Completable unlock(App app, String password)
      we use completable method to sort the apps this method compare the entered password to the stored password if the matched it will allow user to enter the restricted app.

      • getAll

        public Single<Set<App>> getAll()
        This method retrieve set of the all apps from the device and from package manager.
        Returns:
        all apps

      • lock

        public Completable lock(String pkg,
                        String password)
        This method Store the password for each app in the database but before storing just the password it self, the password get hashed and added some random generated latters and numbers to it (salt) that when it stored in the database it can be different from the other apps that have tha same password.
        Parameters:
        pkg - take String package name
        password - take String password.
        Returns:
        hashed password

      • unlock

        public Completable unlock(App app,
                          String password)
        we use completable method to sort the apps this method compare the entered password to the stored password if the matched it will allow user to enter the restricted app.
        Parameters:
        app - takes an app object.
        password - takes a string password
        Returns:
        hashed password.

      • remove

        public Completable remove(App app)
        this method see if there is any app restricted if so it will delete it other wise does nothing.
        Parameters:
        app - takes an app object
        Returns:
        returns app.
